summary: The Sexual Assault Nurse Examiner in VA Hospitals Act of 2025 mandates that the Secretary of Veterans Affairs employ sexual assault nurse examiners (SANE) or qualified healthcare providers at VA hospitals and urgent care facilities. The bill also requires verbal referrals for mental health care services for individuals examined for sexual assault, offering options within the VA system or through Veterans Care Agreements. It emphasizes that implementing this act should not negatively impact existing patient care responsibilities. Definitions from the DNA Sexual Assault Justice Act of 2004 are used.
